trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Gainesville
There were no other sightings in Gainesville on or around September 10th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsAt about 8 oclock my wife and i hopped in the hot tub to relax, we have a great veiw of the stars. at about 8:15 we observed a trianguler craft flying at a high rate of speed heading south, It had three lights underneath, There were no flashing lights or a beacon light.We did have the noise of the hot tub but herd no sound.The craft quickly left our line of site behind the trees.Just seconds after it left our site an airplane at roughly the same altitude flew over us in the opposite direction of the unknown craft.What surprised us is that even with the hot tub running we could here the jet engines of the airplane as it flew over. we do have a lot of airplanes fly over this area,and what we saw was no airplane.
Summary: triangulare craft flying n-to-south very fast no sound
